name: Void Golf
description:
Void Golf is a little game about shooting giant pieces of space rock into black holes, using gravitational fields, physics-defying walls and wormholes.

As in traditional human golf, the fewer hits, the better.

No need to worry though, you can always hide the hit counter and just chill.

Controls
  • [Left click] to charge the shot.
  • [Spacebar] to reset an ongoing shot (the hit still counts, though!)
  • [H] to hide/show the hit counter.

You can play in your browser or download the game. Mac OS X and Linux versions weren't tested, so be prepared for the worst!

Font Futile Pro by @somepx
